rules_text:
Discipline [i](This creature gains abilities from its types. Whenever it enters or you put a counter on it, it gains your choice of these types.)[/i]
[b]Cleric[/b] | This creature gets +1/+0 for each basic land type among lands you control.
[b]Warrior [/b]| Whenever this creature attacks, put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield tapped. If that land is basic, untap it.
